name: Infogenx Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Infogenx Pvt Ltd is an emerging Information Consultancy Services started with three decades of experienced IT Professionals especially focused on Data Analytics, all types of Data related works, Web, Mobile, cloud, custom software Application Services to assist their clients to reach their Goals.
Infogenx has continued to strive towards becoming a complete multi-disciplinary IT consultancy services offering our Clients the specialist individual attention and solutions required by an ever-changing IT project environments. Infogenx uses teamwork in every project as the key success element and is responsible for creating this environment. The overall project manager is duty-bound in ensuring efficient and regular communication to all stakeholders and at all levels.
Infogenx believes in a hands-on approach for all projects. That is why the Board of the firm will always be in control of the key functions on our projects. We have equipped with the latest technology and has the necessary staff and resources to ensure the best professional service is provided at all times.
READ MORE...

locations.address: No.34, C-1, Metha.S Gokulam,, Kuberan Nagar, Velachery
